title: Nietzsche & Pirsig - 2 Moralities We Still Experience (Even Politically)
description:
In the very beginning of my exploration of Nietzsche's Genealogy of Morals, I noticed something  interesting things about Arete vs Priestly Morality. Please feel free to correct me in the comments, or add tp, as I am not any kind of formal philosophy student.

Dr. Gregory Sadler: https://youtu.be/MlojPJr4-Vo
Dr. Eric Dodson: https://youtu.be/jKpOjtZA1n0

Patreon link: https://www.patreon.com/A_Quality_Existence
